Class UserHistoryPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • java_source_code_management_tool.view.UserHistoryPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener
    public class UserHistoryPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener
    This class consists of view methods related to the display of the user history panel following the Model-View-Controller pattern.
    Author:
    Jordan and Yanis (Group 4 - Pair 10)
    See Also:
